kv15.9:5.3: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṃ cittanti?
kv15.9:5.6: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṃ cittanti?
kv15.9:5.8: Hañci natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṃ cittaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:6.3: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.9:6.6: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.9:6.8: Aphassakassa kālaṃkiriyā, avedanakassa kālaṃkiriyā … pe … acittakassa kālaṃkiriyāti?
kv15.9:6.13: nanu saphassakassa kālaṃkiriyā … pe … sacittakassa kālaṃkiriyāti?
kv15.9:6.17: Hañci saphassakassa kālaṃkiriyā … pe … sacittakassa kālaṃkiriyā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:7.3: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv15.9:7.6: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ na kameyya, satthaṃ na kameyya, aggi na kameyyāti?
kv15.9:7.8: Hañci saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ na kameyya, satthaṃ na kameyya, aggi na kameyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:8.3: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv15.9:9.3: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno na kālaṃ kareyyāti?
kv15.9:9.5: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno na kālaṃ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:10.3: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṃ kareyyāti?
kv15.9:10.5: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṃ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
